articles.title: War Victory Day to Be Grandly Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
War Victory Day to Be Grandly Celebrated in DPRK
 Grand celebrations of the war victory day will be held on the initiative of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Grand celebrations are to be held in Pyongyang, capital of the revolution, amid great expectation and concern of all the service personnel and people to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War this year, the first year of the another century of the Juche era. 
					
					 The celebrations will be the grand festival of victors to fully demonstrate the indomitable spirit of heroic Korea advancing toward the final victory united close around the great leader and great party, and national dignity over the world once again. 
					
					 Nearly six decades have passed since the fireworks were displayed in the sky over this land and there have been replacement of generations and change of mountains. However, the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung in achieving the victory in the war are shining more brightly as the days go by. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the Korean People's Army, which was only two years old since it was developed into regular armed forces, and the Korean people, who had been members of ruined nation just five years ago, to defeat the brigandish U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and their stooges and honorably protected the sovereignty of the country and the nation. 
					
					 Under the leadership of the party and the leader the army and people of the DPRK performed immortal exploits in the war and achieved great victory, thus becoming the first heroic army and people who defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressors in the world. 
					
					 Stressing the need for posterity to successfully inherit the exploits and spirit of the elder revolutionaries down through generations, the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un proposed to grandly celebrate the war victory day this significant year and took lovely measures of inviting representatives of war veterans across the country to Pyongyang. 
					
					 The preparations are being made in full gear to have the celebrations as great auspicious ones. 
					
					 The celebrations will record a glorious chapter in the history of the country. They will serve as a historical occasion of fully displaying the firm confidence and will of all the service personnel and people to glorify for all ages the exploits in war victory and the exploits of Songun revolution achieved by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and strikingly demonstrating the might of powerful country of Mt. Paektu under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Makes Field Survey of Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and Two Farms
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Makes Field Survey of Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and Two Farms 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, learned about the work of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex on the spot.
					 The workers of the complex are registering achievements in fertilizer production through technological updating of production processes to glorify the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and implement the idea of the party for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 He convened a consultative meeting, after acquainting himself with the construction of power transmission and supply grid.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of supplying sufficient electricity to the complex and organized the work for completing the power grid construction at the earliest possible date.
					
					 He also looked round the Oryu Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 He met farmers who work with devotion for agricultural production with patriotism, and admired their achievements. He learned about the problems arising in vegetable production.
					
					 Prior to this, he toured the Taechon Farm in Rinsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 He learned about the farm which is turning mountains to good account and managing its economic life more assiduously, true to the idea of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un on land management.
					
					 He took measures for solving the problems arising in putting the farming on a scientific and technological basis despite the unfavorable weather conditions.

articles.title: Towers for Immortality of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected across DPRK
articles.content:
Towers for Immortality of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected across DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Towers bearing an inscription "The great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" were splendidly erected in all provinces, cities (districts), counties and rural communities and at industrial establishments in the DPRK.
					 This is a manifestation of the strong will and ardent loyalty of the army and people of the DPRK to hold President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to highly praise the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and add shine to their undying feats generation after generation.
					
					 Party members and other people across the country made strenuous efforts to build the towers in a short span of time in their residential areas in boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and eternal sun of Juche, and Kim Jong Il, matchless patriot and benevolent father of people.
					
					 The towers will shine forever along with noble mentality of the army and people dynamically advancing toward the final victory being blessed with illustrious leaders.

articles.title: Meetings of Provinces and Ministry of Railways Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Meetings of Provinces and Ministry of Railways Congratulate Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in South and North Hwanghae and Ryanggang provinces and at the Ministry of Railways on Monday to extend congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his holding of the title of the DPRK Marshal.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, the Ministry of Railways and its affiliated units, working people and youth and students.
					
					 Conveyed there was a decision of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The speakers said that the decision on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un was a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the WPK and the revolution and that it is of great significance in the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the WPK has strengthened into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution, they noted.
					
					 They called upon officials, party members and other working people to regard Kim Jong Il's patriotism as their faith, dynamically push forward the general advance in the new 100 years of the Juche era and bring about a turn in developing economy and improving the standard of people's living. 
					
					 They stressed that the revolution of the DPRK is invincible as long as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the ever-victorious party, the great unity of army and people, the unchallenged revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and powerful self-supporting economy, which are precious revolutionary legacies of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Woolen Carpet, Gift to Kim Il Sung from Cambodia
articles.content:
Woolen Carpet, Gift to Kim Il Sung from Cambodia
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The exhibits at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea include a woolen carpet presented to President Kim Il Sung by a special envoy of the C.C., the National United Front of Cambodia in August Juche 60 (1971).
					 In Cambodia woolen carpet has been considered to be one of things showing sincerity to benefactor.
					
					 The special envoy prepared the carpet with deep reverence and best wishes for Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea to show the road ahead of the world progressives and rendered sincere support to the Cambodians in the anti-U.S. national salvation struggle.
					
					 He said that the gift reflects the unanimous will of the Cambodians to hold the President in high esteem as the lodestar of human liberation. It also carries the ardent wish that the President would enjoy good health and lead the Cambodian people to victory and glory, the envoy added.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Mission to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Mission to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A personage of the international organization and Chinese figures sent floral baskets to the DPRK mission in Hong Kong of China on July 18 and 19. It was to congratulate Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on his holding of the title of the DPRK Marshal. 
					 They were Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, the general director of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, China and the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak's Nonsense
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak's Nonsense
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime is resorting to a sleight of hand to conceal its attempted heinous state-sponsored terrorist act. Involved there are TVs, Dong-A Ilbo, Yonhap News and other reptile media. They blared that the north's assertions are groundless, going the length of saying that organizations of "defectors from the north" could have done it.
					 It is as a despicable act as trying to get the sun eclipsed by palm.
					
					 The attempt at demolishing statues of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu is a heinous politically-motivated terrorist act which the Lee puppet regime pushed forward in an intentional and planned way under the manipulation of the U.S.
					
					 As far as the "Statue Demolition Society" in which Jon Yong Chol was involved is concerned, its aim is to demolish leaders' statues in the DPRK. The organization exists in reality in south Korea and those involved in it are not subject to any legal sanctions. What does it mean?
					
					 As the illegal investigation into civilians shows, a word and a footstep made by people in south Korea are under watch and control of the Intelligence Service. Those who write or speak in praises of the north are fated to be handcuffed and those who visited the DPRK where their fellow countrymen live are to be taken away to prison. This is the situation of south Korea.
					
					 The existence of the said organization is absolutely impossible without the interference of the puppet regime which is keen on confrontation of social systems and fratricidal showdown.
					
					 The same is the case for an explosive launcher. This time the criminals tried to introduce three parts of an explosive device in secrecy through different channels as it was a terrorist weapon whose use is banned worldwide, assemble it on the spot and examine its performance before finally handing it over to a person who would execute the "plan".
					
					 Nearly millions of U.S. dollars were allocated for the manufacture of the launching device and its secret introduction. How can it be done by the organizations of stooges such as the "Front for Liberation of the North Koreans" and the society?
					
					 As widely known to the world, to get a job in south Korea is more difficult than dying. Moreover, "defectors from the north" are snubbed and censured everywhere. They are denied jobs and suffer from uneasiness and fear. Finally, they join the anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations such as the front and the society in order to keep dirty bodies alive. If those fools imported and circulated even terrorist weapons for special use with their own money, this would make even a cow laugh.
					
					 The bandit of such human scum planned to photograph through the satellite the area where the "case" will occur in a bid to attain the "greatest effect" of the "undertaking". This is something impossible to be done alone.
					
					 All the facts clearly show that the attempt to demolish statues is from A to Z a heinous criminal act which was openly choreographed by the Lee regime.
					
					 Nevertheless, the group of traitors is letting reptile media blare that a civilian organization could have been behind the case. This is another outrageous politically-motivated provocation and invective slandering the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to it.
					
					 Anyone who intends to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and encroach on it even a bit will never be able to survive on the earth.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Chides Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Confrontation Farce
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Chides Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Confrontation Farce
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea put a few penny of money into the "unification jar" and talked nonsense that "judging from every circumstances, one can know that unification is in sight" and "unification is, indeed, near at hand".
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined commentary on Monday brands the remarks made by Lee, who is steeped in wild ambition of "unification of social systems", as deceptive ones intended to escape from his worst ruling crisis by escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is needless to say that Lee had the "unification by absorption" and "unification of social systems" in his mind when he said "unification is near at hand", says the commentary, and goes on:
					
					 Lee and his clan have pursued the anachronistic policy of confrontation with compatriots from the outset of their seizure of power and have gone reckless in the unprecedented confrontation racket while openly trumpeting that the "supreme dream and goal" are to realize the "unification under the free democratic system". All these facts are well known to the world.
					
					 They made no scruple of daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and trying to commit even hideous terrorist act. Clear is that if the Lee group had not been seated on the chair of power, the reconciliation, cooperation and unification between the north and the south would have been brought earlier.
					
					 The reunification of Korea is being put off, not because of lack of money but due to the anti-reunification group of traitors like Lee.
					
					 Lee's fate is now at stake as he is forsaken by not only south Koreans but his clan including the "Saenuri Party" due to a series of scandals involving his relatives and confidants. This clearly shows that collapse of the Lee Myung Bak regime is near at hand.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Anti-DPRK War Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Anti-DPRK War Moves
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. secretary of Defence made a provocative remark that north Korea's "instable act" is "one of vast provocations" that the world now faces. The U.S. assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs said they will draw an "international responding line" to head off north Korea's "additional provocation". The U.S. secretary of State said the "way of provocation" by north Korea "is a grave threat to the security in Asia and the rest of the world". These words are being snowballed by hostile forces to the north such as Japan and south Korean puppet regime and good-for-nothings as well.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article says their assertions are impudent rhetoric of provokers who can recklessly do everything for their sinister political aim.
					
					 It is the ultimate goal of the U.S. imperialists to ensnare the DPRK into a trap of international isolation by picking on it and to stifle its socialist system by force, the article said.
					
					 Its goal is to bring pressure to countries neighboring the DPRK, said the article, adding:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S., Japan and south Korea recently waged combined naval drills around the Jeju Island of south Korea.
					
					 This was unprecedented, very dangerous military trend.
					
					 The U.S. is related with Japan and south Korea respectively by military alliance. If Japan-south Korea military ties are formed, the triangular military alliance would be completed.
					
					 Under this situation crystal clear is their aim of waging the combined naval drills involving the three parties.
					
					 The second Korean war looms closer due to the U.S. efforts. The U.S. nearly finished its strategy of "pacification" in the Mid-east region and now is going to turn its spearhead to the DPRK.
					
					 However, its criminal aim can never come true.
					
					 The DPRK does not want a war, but if the U.S. ignites another unjust war, the DPRK will react to it with just war.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A Lao government economic delegation headed by Vice-Minister of Industry and Commerce Siaosavath Savengsuksa on Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and laid a bouquet before the statues before paying tribute to them.
					 The delegation arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Pyongyang Children's Department Store Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Children's Department Store Opens
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Children's Department Store which was built in Changjon Street opened on July 19.
					 It has secured quantities of modern quality goods loved by children, and exhibited them in peculiar way for sale.
					
					 On the opening day, the shop was packed with children and their parents.
					
					 The spectacular play rooms created on each floor were crowded with children all day long.
					
					 TVs showing cartoons and Karaoke for children and soft drink stands added to the delight of visitors.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent several thousand pieces of amusement equipment to the store.

articles.title: Exhibition of Goods for Daily Use Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Exhibition of Goods for Daily Use Opens in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of 206 kinds of goods for daily use was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Railway Station Department Store here Monday.
					 In July 1976 President Kim Il Sung specified tasks and ways for producing the goods for daily use and helped work out the list of 206 kinds.
					
					 On Nov. 24 last year leader Kim Jong Il instructed officials to hold sundry goods exhibition in every July and set forth the tasks to bring about a decisive turn in their production and contribute to improving the people's livelihood, true to the noble intention of the President.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibition are 78,000 goods of over 300 kinds produced by sundry goods production plants in light industrial field and in factories and enterprises under ministries and national institutions. 
					
					 In the period of the exhibition, a lecture is due to be given to deal with scientific and technological issues arising in the production of the daily necessities and visits are to be made to modern daily-necessities factories.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Visit Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of KPA
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of KPA
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and his embassy officials visited the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army on Monday on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Being briefed on the feats the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed in building and developing the powerful defense industry of the country, they looked round the displayed weapons and combat and technical equipment produced at munitions factories of the DPRK.
					
					 The ambassador wrote in the visitor's book that the DPRK has in store modern arms and equipment to defend the country. He wished the fraternal Korean people happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Korean Students from Japan Meet Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Korean Students from Japan Meet Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner 
 Pyongyang July 23 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan led by Kim Yong Ju, department director of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, met with former unconverted long-term prisoner Choe Thae Guk, an indomitable pro-reunification patriot.
					 Choe said that he fought for decades against the enemies' horrible tortures and appeasement which baffled human imagination.
					
					 He could remain true to the revolutionary faith as he enshrined the boundless trust in the party and the leader and the firm confidence in the victory, he said.
					
					 He emphasized that after coming into the embrace of leader Kim Jong Il who took deep care of the destinies of revolutionary soldiers in a responsible manner, he could lead a worthwhile life as a hero of the DPRK and a winner of the National Reunification Prize.
					
					 He voiced his expectation that the members of the delegation would give a steady continuity to the principle of patriotism and to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jo Hwi Se and Jo Yong Gi, members of the delegation, said that they were greatly encouraged by the spirit of those pro-reunification patriotic fighters who remained loyal to the revolutionary principle to the last.
					
					 They evinced their pledge to prepare themselves to be reliable pillars contributing to building a thriving socialist nation and developing Chongryon.
					
					 An art performance was given by former unconverted long-term prisoners and their families and the members of the delegation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on Saturday received a letter from the participants in the meeting of officials of chapters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) to provide a springboard for ushering in a new heyday.
					 The letter said the great pleasure pervaded every place in Japan where Koreans live on the exciting news that Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of the DPRK Marshal.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a congratulatory message to the meeting to make it a glorious one to be recorded forever in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan for the happiness of Chongryon and compatriots, the letter said.
					
					 The letter expressed the will to make the meeting a significant occasion for injecting vitality into the Chongryon organization as a whole and ushering in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan as instructed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It voiced the firm will to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of the nation and steadily advance the movement of Koreans in Japan along the only way of Juche, the patriotic way for prosperity, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Chapters Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Chapters Held 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials of the chapters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Saturday to provide a springboard for ushering in a new heyday. 
					 Present at the meeting were Chairman Ho Jong Man and other officials of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, officials of the headquarters, chapters, organizations and enterprises of Chongryon. 
					
					 Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, read out a congratulatory message sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un to the participants in the meeting. 
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a report. 
					
					 He said that the message from Marshal Kim Jong Un serves as the important guidelines and invincible treasured sword helping Chongryon steadily advance the movement of Koreans in Japan along the way of Juche, patriotic way for prosperity, true to the behests of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The purpose of the meeting is to generalize the achievements and experience gained in the work of Chongryon chapters, drastically intensify and expand the emulation drive among chapters and thus present the report of victory to the eternal leader Kim Jong Il and make firm loyalty pledge to Kim Jong Un, the reporter said.
					
					 He added the emulation drive among Chongryon chapters is conscientious and patriotic one to carry out the behests of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and to ensure the happiness of Koreans in Japan and posterity. 
					
					 He called upon the officials of the Chongryon chapters to bear in mind the deep loving care and firmly believe in Marshal Kim Jong Un, symbol of invincibility, and advance toward the final victory despite storm and stress. 
					
					 Chairmen of chapters made speeches. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting. 
					
					 Chongryon chapters are bases of the patriotic movement of Koreans in Japan for rallying them and protecting their national identity and rights, as well as units of their living. 
					
					 On April 6, 30 chapters of Chongryon called for the emulation drive among chapters. Only three months later, 121 chapters of Chongryon involving about 85 percent of Koreans in Japan have taken part in the drive, becoming a new mass movement unprecedented in a matter of three months.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow to Mete Out Punishment to Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow to Mete Out Punishment to Provokers
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The army and people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now hardening their will to punish the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors, enraged at their terrorist acts aimed to destroy statues of the great persons in the DPRK.
					 Ho Jong Gil, general officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, told KCNA:
					
					 "The United States is a kingpin of international terrorism. The U.S. imperialists will face merciless punishment by the Korean army and people for their encroachment on the DPRK's sovereignty and security.
					
					 The hideous terrorism, recently attempted at the direction of the U.S., is tantamount to anti-DPRK sabotage unprecedented in history.
					
					 It is the fixed will of our army and people to build a prosperous and powerful nation, holding their leaders in high esteem as the eternal sun. We condemn the U.S. imperialists' attempt to remove the mental mainstay of the Korean nation as a downright challenge to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and an unpardonable, political terrorism."
					
					 Ham Sin Ung, a KPISF officer, said:
					
					 "The recent case shows that the U.S. imperialists are employing every conceivable means to topple the socialist system of the DPRK. There will be no change in the U.S. intention to antagonize and stifle the ideology and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 We will devotedly safeguard the headquarters of the revolution with arms, sharply watching any sinister plot against the DPRK on the part of the U.S. imperialists."
					
					 Kang Jun Sik, an officer of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, said:
					
					 "It is the U.S. imperialists' typical method to gather outlaws and instigate them to create social unrest and then make it a pretext for military intervention and aggression on any country.
					
					 But such method can never work on the DPRK where all the people form a big harmonious family while always following their leader with deep trust in him.
					
					 Any anti-DPRK plot-breeding base, wherever it may be, will be blown up when the army and people of the DPRK give vent to their pent-up anger."

articles.title: Nobody Can Break Unity of DPRK Society: Local People
articles.content:
Nobody Can Break Unity of DPRK Society: Local People
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime, in collusion with the United States, schemed to destroy statues and monuments, holy places in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This hideous attempted sabotage is pushing the people of the DPRK into great fury.
					
					 Om Sung Guk, section chief of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "The recent case shows that the Lee group of traitors has gone to the extremes in confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK already warned more than once that capital punishment would be meted out to those who do harm to the dignity of its supreme leadership, wherever they may be.
					
					 We can never allow the Lee clan of rats to run amuck to break the single-minded unity of our society even by prodding defectors to the south, human dregs, to sabotage."
					
					 Sim Jong Chol, a worker at the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, said:
					
					 "All the workers of the factory are now eager to make reprisals on the Lee group of traitors.
					
					 We will exterminate all of those who dare hurt the dignity of the great persons all Koreans regard as Heaven.
					
					 No force can break the strong unity of the DPRK people."

articles.title: Downpour Hits Northern Inland of Korea
articles.content:
Downpour Hits Northern Inland of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Downpour hit northern inland areas of Korea, affected by low pressure passing the northern region.
					 From 18:00 Sunday to 09:00 Monday, 218 mm rainfalls were registered in Taegwan County, 194 mm in Chonma County, 183 mm in Tongchang County, 170 mm in Kusong City, 162 mm Ryongchon County and 151 mm Phihyon County, North Phyongan Province and 174 mm in Songwon County, Jagang Province.
					
					 It also rained more than 100 mm in several areas including Sinuiju City and Sonchon, Changsong, Uiju and Pyokdong counties in North Phyongan Province.
					
					 In particular, 79 mm and 53 mm of heavy rain fell in Tongchang County and Sinuiju City respectively from 21:00 to 23:50 Sunday, 114 mm in Ryongchon County from 00:00 to 02:00 Monday, 81 mm in Taegwan County from 01:00 to 02:55, 66 mm in Tongchang County from 03:00 to 05:00, 34 mm in Kusong and 32 mm in Unsan County from 05:00 to 06:00 and 50 mm in Kophung County, Jagang Province from 00:30 to 03:00 Monday.
					
					 A wind measuring over 10 meters per second swept Chonma, Sonchon, Tongrim and Yomju counties, North Phyongan Province.
					
					 More torrential rainfalls are expected in those areas.

articles.title: Kyongsang Kindergarten Produces Many Music Talents
articles.content:
Kyongsang Kindergarten Produces Many Music Talents
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Kyongsang Kindergarten in Changjon Street of Pyongyang is well known for training young musicians.
					 Over the past 30 odd years the kindergarten has produced many music prodigies.
					
					 Among them are Ma Sin A, who delighted leader Kim Jong Il with her skillful piano rendition at the concert for commemorating the Day of the Sun in 2010, and Yu Pyol Mi, who won the top and special prizes at the 56th Schumann International Juvenile Piano Concours.
					
					 They also include Choe Jang Hung, Ri Yu Jong, Han Si Nae and Pak Mi Yong, who bagged top prizes and special prizes at the 20th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest held in Poland this year, and those who played guitar quartet to win high admiration at the 9th international festival in Moscow.
					
					 Ri Myong Il, a conductor of the Unhasu Orchestra, Kim Ji Won, a composer of the Wangjaesan Light Music Band, Ryu Hyon Ho, a conductor of the State Merited Chorus, too, are graduates of this kindergarten.
					
					 Some days ago the dear respected Kim Jong Un visited the kindergarten and praised it for producing many music wonders, mentioning the names of some of them.
					
					 According to head of the kindergarten Ri Kang Juk, the kindergarten selects children with an instinct for music in a systematic way and applies teaching methods suitable to their intelligence and practical ability to help them have a basic knowledge of music.
					
					 Teachers' high abilities and sufficient equipment are also very important for education of children, she said.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Accused of Arresting Reunification Champion
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of Arresting Reunification Champion 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The July 13th issue of the Brazilian paper Hora do Povo carried an article under the title of "The south Korean authorities arrested Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon)". It denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for its treacherous and anti-reunification crimes.
					 The fascist hooligans of south Korea arrested Ro in the eyes of the world upon his return to south Korea via the Demarcation Line in Panmunjom from Pyongyang where he attended the memorial service to mark the 100th day since the demise of general secretary Kim Jong Il, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 They even stormed the office of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and Ro's house to search them and arrested its secretary general.
					
					 The fascist authorities of south Korea seek to inflict severe punishment upon reunification champions on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" and "infiltration and escape".
					
					 Though the south Korean authorities trumpet "human rights", "democracy", "unification" and so on, all the facts indicate that they are just a deception to cover up their traitorous anti-popular and anti-reunification nature.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Hold Military Exercise in Forefront Areas
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Hold Military Exercise in Forefront Areas 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The First Army Corps of south Korea plans to stage a huge military exercise against the DPRK in the forefront areas including Phaju and Koyang of Kyonggi Province from July 23 to 27, according to Korean Broadcasting System of south Korea.
					 They are going to hurl even reserve army, civilians, administrative officials and the police into the exercise, not to mention all the troops under its corps, and stage the drill day and night under the cloak of coping with sudden attack and terror.

articles.title: Japan's Policy of Discrimination against Koreans under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Policy of Discrimination against Koreans under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the hall of the members of the House of Representatives in Tokyo on July 18 to demand immediate application of tuition-free program for senior high school to Korean schools. It was co-sponsored by Japanese organizations such as the Liaison Society Opposing Exclusion of Korean Schools from Tuition-free Program for Senior High Schools, Forum Peace, Human Rights and Environment of Japan and the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange.
					 Present there were officials of the General Association of the Korean Residents in Japan, Koreans in Japan, dietmen, members of the organizations supporting Korean schools across Japan.
					
					 Only the Korean schools are still excluded from the tuition waiver program for senior high schools even though the program has been enforced for two years, the speakers said. They urgently demanded an immediate application of the program to all schools.
					
					 The Japanese government, however, has postponed the judgment of the application of the program, citing political and diplomatic issues as an excuse, they noted.
					
					 They pledged to consolidate solidarity between Koreans in Japan and the Japanese and wage a dynamic movement to have the program applied to Korean schools in Japan at an early date by raising public concern for the issue.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Repeal Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Repeal Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S., Japan and south Korea in a joint briefing on the sidelines of the recent ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum called for the DPRK's "scrap of nuclear program and halt to missile fire".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such an action is a smear campaign against the DPRK prompted by the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward it.
					
					 That the U.S. spoke ill of the inviolable independent rights of the DPRK before his stooges was an impudent and reckless action.
					
					 It was the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK that forced it to build self-defensive nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK could not but take steps to build such a deterrence to defend the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation and ensure the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 To urge the DPRK to give up everything and just sit bare-handed under such circumstances where there is no peace-keeping mechanism in the peninsula is just like expecting rain from the bright sky.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, it would be absolutely impossible for the U.S. to settle any issue with the DPRK unless the U.S. repeals its hostile policy.
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges in the joint briefing expressed tough stand, blustering that they would take decisive measures in the event of additional nuclear test or missile fire by the DPRK.
					
					 Clear to all is what this means. This precisely indicates their will not to rule out a nuclear war.
					
					 If the U.S. takes the "decisive step", the DPRK will answer it with tougher step.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Hit for Committing Treacherous Crimes against Reunification
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Hit for Committing Treacherous Crimes against Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A heinous terrorist case against the DPRK was disclosed through testimonies by a terrorist who was 
					arrested recently. It was the worst treacherous criminal act of hurting all servicepersons and people of the DPRK who are holding the great persons of Mt. Paektu in high esteem as the eternal fathers of the nation. Rodong Sinmun says this in a bylined article Monday. It goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea, far from drawing a lesson from the grave situation entailed by a series of its acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, attempted to commit more heinous terrorist act. This can never be pardoned even after the lapse of tens of thousands of years.
					
					 The pride and self-confidence of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK who are holding in high esteem the peerlessly great persons as the sun praised by the world people represent their dignity and honor. The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors attempted the heinous terrorist act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even though they were well aware of this. This is a high treason aimed to do harm to the dignity, life and future of all the Koreans as it is an extremely dangerous politically-motivated military provocation.
					
					 The heinous terrorist case is the most brutal anti-reunification, anti-peace crime totally denying the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and gravely threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Lee group's frantic acts of subversion and sabotage such as challenging the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are a revelation of its foolish attempt at "unification through absorption". The recent case proved that the moves of the U.S. and the puppet group to ignite a war against the DPRK have reached a very grave stage and that a nuclear war may break out on the Korean Peninsula any moment.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-reunification Activists under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-reunification Activists under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on July 20 made public a special statement in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' frantic suppression of pro-reunification activists.
					 The statement said: There is no ground to assert that Pyongyang visit paid by Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the Pomminryon South Headquarters, posed threat to public security as it was aimed at national reconciliation and peace. It, therefore, does not go against the "Security Law."
					
					 Peace and prosperity of the nation can be guaranteed by implementation of inter-Korean declarations only. This is known to everybody but the "government" denies them and sticks to tightening alliance with the U.S.
					
					 Dictatorial acts of stifling the fellow countrymen by drawing Japan, which lays territorial claim to Tok Islets, and working hard to stay in power, have originated from the stand of following the U.S. and Japan, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The present "government" is the band of hooligans as they dragged Ro Su Hui like a piece of baggage in the eyes of all Koreans and the world and hurt the supreme dignity of the nation without hesitation.
					
					 The struggle of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon which explored the way for peace between the south and the north can never be a sin but deserves admiration.
					
					 The statement declared that the organization would stage an active mass struggle to condemn the authorities' crimes against the nation and force them to release all the detained pro-reunification activists.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Marks Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Marks Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, Internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on July 7 carried an article dedicated by its Representative Ro Kil Nam to the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The article said that though the President passed away, he still lives in the hearts of the fellow countrymen in the north, overseas Koreans and the world progressives amid their ardent reverence for him.
					
					 It was his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, the article noted, praising him for defeating two outrageous imperialisms in one generation in reliance on the people and building socialism of Juche, the country for the people.
					
					 He protected the country's sovereignty with his own efforts for decades while standing against the U.S., and worked day and night to reunify the divided country, it added, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC), held the President in high esteem as the eternal leader and successfully carried forward his revolutionary cause.
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un made sure that leader Kim Jong Il is being held in high esteem as eternal chairman of the NDC.
					
					 The DPRK fully demonstrates the might of the single-minded unity of the leader, the party, the army and the people under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It has already emerged as political, ideological and military power, arts and musical power and cutting-edge scientific and technological power.
					
					 The world watches with concerned eyes the DPRK successfully carrying out the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Punishment of   U.S., Kingdom of Terrorism, Urged
articles.content:
Punishment of U.S., Kingdom of Terrorism, Urged
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed that the United States orchestrated the recently attempted terrorism to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in flagrant violation of international law.
					 Hong Chol Hwa, director of the Law Institute under the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 "Not a few U.N. General Assembly resolutions and international conventions on terrorism were adopted in the 20th century, defining terrorism as international crime.
					
					 The Declaration on Measures to Eliminate International Terrorism, adopted at the UN General Assembly in 1994, and the code on crimes against peace and security of mankind, adopted at the U.N. Commission on International Law, define as a serious international crime any country's act to organize, encourage and instigate activity intended to undermine or destabilize other country's socio-political system, making it a duty for all nations to prohibit such conducts.
					
					 But the United States, which has staged 'total war on terrorism' after the '9/11 incident', committed extra large-scale terrorist acts against the DPRK.
					
					 The news of attempted terrorism is giving a great shock to the international community."
					
					 Ri Kyong Chol, a section chief of the institute, said:
					
					 "There are many international conventions on combating terrorism at present.
					
					 Typical are the International Convention for the Suppression of Terrorist Bombings and the International Convention for the Suppression of the Financing of Terrorism. These conventions elaborate on the kinds of international terrorism and stipulate that those who commit such crimes be severely punished regardless of their political motives and prescription be not applied to those criminals.
					
					 The recently detected terrorism against the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership is evidently a hideous crime contrary to the internationally-established anti-terrorism system.
					
					 In particular, the system prohibits encroachment upon the life, health and honor of heads of state. Nevertheless, the United States appointed as targets of terrorism the statues of the great men whom the DPRK people are holding in high esteem as their eternal leaders and attempted to use the internationally banned explosives."
					
					 Han Sok Bong, a researcher at the Institute, said:
					
					 "With the recent hideous terrorist attempt the U.S. seriously encroached on the security of the DPRK.
					
					 According to international law, a victim state is entitled to take necessary counteraction against an assailant state.
					
					 The U.S. should admit the gravity of the terrorist case and officially apologize to the DPRK for this hideous crime."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Life Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Life Lauded by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and magazines carried special write-ups to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Nepalese paper Arpan on July 13 carried an article under the title of "Kim Il Sung was a great revolutionary and a great person" with his portrait.
					
					 The July issue of the Pakistani magazine Ilal Amam carried an article entitled "A life replete with the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven" with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The magazine said: The President regarded it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven all his life. He set forth the people as teacher and almighty being. He gave field guidance for the people's happiness till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 The 14th issue of the Mozambican paper Noticias carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un with an article titled "The Korean people remember the exploits of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The paper introduced the sacred revolutionary history of the President who built a socialist country for the happiness of the people in Korea.
					
					 The 198th issue of the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare carried an article titled "President Kim Il Sung enjoys immortality".
					
					 He was not only an outstanding revolutionary but a person of noble character, the paper said, adding that even politicians of those countries hostile toward the DPRK, to say nothing of those with differing ethnicity, nationality, political view and religious belief respected him as the greatest person after meeting him.

articles.title: Ethiopian Bulletin Praises Invincible KPA
articles.content:
Ethiopian Bulletin Praises Invincible KPA 
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea published the 41st issue of its bulletin titled "Invincible Korean People's Army" to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The invincibility of the KPA lies in its politico-ideological might, its matchless military and technological might and its great unity with the people, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 Most significant in the might of the KPA is that it has been led by the peerlessly brilliant commanders.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of the KPA, was a legendary brilliant commander who defeated two powerful imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il, the President's great successor, was also peerlessly brilliant commander who always emerged victorious with his original Songun politics in the battle without gunfire with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 In the van of the KPA stands Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The KPA led by him will always win victory.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim visita el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim visita el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
 Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo en el terreno la gestion del Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung.
					 La clase obrera del complejo logra exitos en la produccion de abono mediante la modernizacion de procesos productivos para hacer brillar las imborrables huellas de direccion del Presidente  Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y realizar el proposito del partido de construir la potencia economica.
					
					 El premier averiguo como marcha la construccion de la red de suministro y distribucion de electricidad al complejo y convoco una reunion de consulta.
					
					 En la ocasion fueron discutidos una serie de problemas, tales como suministrar suficiente electricidad al complejo, y se asignaron las tareas para terminar cuanto antes la construccion de la red de transmision y distribucion de energia electrica.
					
					 Por otra parte, Choe estuvo en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Oryu del capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					
					 Se reunio con los granjeros de alli, que trabajan con abnegacion con la voluntad patriotica, reconociendo sus exitos y averiguo los problemas surgidos en la produccion de verduras.
					
					 Con anterioridad, el recorrio la Granja de Taechon del distrito de Rinsan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					
					 Se entero de que esa granja logra exitos en la lucha para mejorar la vida economica convirtiendo todas las montanas en las de grandes utilidades en pleno acato a la idea del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un sobre la administracion territorial.
					
					 Tomo las medidas para impulsar la agricultura de manera cientifico-tecnica pese al mal tiempo que persiste en el pais.

articles.title: EE.UU. es autor violador de la ley internacional
articles.content:
EE.UU. es autor violador de la ley internacional
 Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- En una entrevista con la ACNC, el jefe de Instituto de Ley de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales Hong Chol Hwa (43 anos de edad) dijo como sigue:
					 Estados Unidos, que ofendio la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, es el autor principal que violo flagrantemente la ley internacional.
					
					 Quedaron aprobados en varias ocasiones las resoluciones de la Asamblea General de la ONU y los convenios internacionales de intensificar la lucha antiterrorista tras definir el terror como crimen internacional, a medida  que al acoger el siglo XX se agrandan en el mundo los danos por el terror.
					
					 La "Declaracion sobre la eliminacion del terrorismo internacional" aprobada en 1994 en la Asamblea General de la ONU y en los "Codigos sobre crimenes desafiantes a la paz y la seguridad de la humanidad" estipulan como grave crimen internacional la organizacion, el fomento y la agitacion de los actos, que destruyen e inestabilizan el regimen socio-politico de otro estado, y obligan a todos  los estados prohibir tales actos.
					
					 Pero, EE.UU., que libra freneticamente la guerra antiterrorista hablando ruidosamente la "guerra total contra el terror" con motivo del "incidente del 11 de Septiembre", cometio un crimen terrorista de gran envergadura contra la RPDC, lo que dio un gran impacto a la sociedad internacional.
					
					 El jefe de la oficina Ri Kyong Chol (44 anos de edad) subrayo:
					
					 Hasta la fecha, en el dominio de la ley internacional fueron firmados muchos acuerdos antiterroristas.
					
					 Los tipicos son el "Convenio internacional sobre la prohibicion de terror por explosivo" y el "Convenio internacional sobre la prohibicion de entrega de fondos para terror".
					
					 Los dichos convenios estipulan detalladamente las formas de manifestacion del terror internacional y el severo castigo a los terroristas sin hacer caso el motivo politico y no aplicacion de prescripcion.
					
					 El presente complot terrorista de EE.UU. contra nuestra maxima dignidad es una accion criminal que viola al regimen antiterrorista establecido en escala internacional.
					
					 En contra de la demanda de tal regimen de no atentar la vida, la salud y el honor de los lideres estatales, EE.UU. tomo como blanco de terror las estatuas de los grandes Hombres venerados por  el pueblo coreano como eternos lideres e intento utilizar el explosivo internacionalmente prohibido, lo que pertenece a archi-crimen internacional.
					
					 El investigador Han Sok Bong (73 anos de edad) subrayo:
					
					 Debido a la presente conspiracion de EE.UU., la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y la seguridad del Estado fueron violadas gravemente.
					
					 Segun la ley internacional, un Estado damnificado por la violencia de otro Estado tiene el derecho a tomar las contramedidas necesarias.
					
					 EE.UU. debe reconocer la gravedad del presente caso y pedir disculpa oficial a la RPDC.

articles.title: ACNC comenta sofisma para eludir responsabilidad del atentado terrorista
articles.content:
ACNC comenta sofisma para eludir responsabilidad del atentado terrorista
 Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- Ahora, la banda de traidores surcoreanos al mando de Lee Myung Bak, que cometio recientemente un gravisimo atentado del terrorismo politico de Estado contra la RPDC, se dio a la tarea de encubrir la verdad de lo ocurrido.
					 Segun las versiones de los medios movilizados para ese fin, tales como las cadenas de TV, Dong-A Ilbo, Yonhap News, la insistencia del Norte (de Corea) no se basa en la realidad y es posible que el atentado haya sido ideado y ejecutado por unas entidades civiles de "fugitivos norcoreanos".
					
					 Es el ultimo coletazo de las escorias humanas a punto de arruinamiento.
					
					 Evidentemente, el intento de sabotaje contra las estatuas de bronce de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu es el caso de terrorismo politico de Estado sin precedentes, planificado y promovido por el gobierno titere surcoreano bajo el control trasero de EE.UU.
					
					 La "Asociacion para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce", a que pertenecia Jon Yong Chol, terrorista descubierto y arrestado recientemente, existe publicamente en la sociedad surcoreana y sus miembros pasan libremente disfrutando de impunidad.
					
					 Como demuestra el destapado caso de inspeccion ilegal de civiles y otros, el Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea capta y vigila todas las palabras y movimientos de los habitantes. 
					
					 Si uno habla o escribe positivamente de la RPDC o la visita, cae prisionero siendo encadenado.
					
					 Bajo estas circunstancias, la existencia de la asociacion en cuestion es imposible sin el consentimiento de las autoridades surcoreanas enloquecidas por enfrentar los regimenes y a los compatriotas del Norte y el Sur.
					
					 Segun planificaron esta vez los criminales, dado que el aparato explosivo (lanza-explosivo) es un arma terrorista controlada mundialmente, sus 3 accesorios debieron introducirse ilegalmente por diferentes vias y ensamblarse en el terreno. Luego, se haria el control de funcionamiento y pasaria al ejecutor de la "accion" (destruccion de la estatua de bronce).
					
					 La fabricacion e introduccion secreta del aparato cuestan millones de dolares.
					
					 ?Sera posible que puedan planear o costear independientemente una operacion de esa magnitud las entidades de lacayos como el "Frente por la Liberacion del Pueblo Norcoreano" o la "Sociedad para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce"?
					
					 Ademas, como conoce todo el mundo, los integrantes de esas entidades son "fugitivos norcoreanos" que impotentes de conseguir el empleo en la sociedad surcoreana, se incorporan a la campana anti-RPDC para ganarse la vida.
					
					 Ellos no pueden organizar jamas a solas la filmacion de satelite artificial sobre el lugar de "explosion", prevista para "maximizar" los efectos de esta accion terrorista.
					
					 Sin embargo, la banda de Lee Myung Bak instiga a los medios venales a reportar como si el presente incidente fuera proyecto de algunas entidades civiles, lo cual significa otra provocacion politica contra la RPDC.
					
					 Los militares y habitantes de la RPDC no dejaran vivos a cualesquier tipejos que se atrevan a ofender o atentar fisicamente contra la dignidad de su Direccion Suprema.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica atentado terrorista de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica atentado terrorista de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- El atentado terrorista anti-RPDC, que fue revelado recientemente en declaraciones de un individuo involucrado en el, resulta peor crimen antinacional que mete punaladas en el corazon de todos los militares y civiles coreanos que estiman como padres eternos de la nacion a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 23, y prosigue:
					
					 En lugar de sacar lecciones de la grave situacion causada por el insulto repetido de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak intenta ahora la imperdonable locura de destruir las estatuas de bronce de los grandes hombres.
					
					 Todos los militares y civiles de la RPDC se sienten dignos y orgullosos de ser integrantes de la nacion del Sol que enaltece a los grandes hombres sin pares admirados por todo el mundo.
					
					 A sabiendas de eso, EE.UU. y la banda de Lee se atreven a esa accion terrorista, lo cual constituye extremada provocacion politica-militar y expresion de la ambicion sobre la "reunificacion mediante absorcion".
					
					 Igualmente, significa acto de traicion inaudito para acabar con la dignidad, la vida y el futuro de toda la nacion.
					
					 El presente caso de terrorismo politico es tambien crimen anti-reunificacion y antipaz que niega totalmente la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y amenaza la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 El hecho demuestra que el estallido de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana por EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos es una cuestion de tiempo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun culpa a Lee Myung Bak de obstaculizar la reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun culpa a Lee Myung Bak de obstaculizar la reunificacion
 Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- En su reciente discurso prolijo, el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak dijo unas palabras irracionales como que "varias circunstancias dejan conocer que no esta lejos el dia de reunificacion" y "viene de cerca la reunificacion".
					 Luego, echo su salario mensual al "tinajon de reunificacion", fondo instaurado para sus siniestros objetivos.
					
					 Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este lunes un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					 Las expresiones usadas por ese traidor, que persigue con fanatismo la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" del Norte y el Sur de Corea, no son mas que un engano para salir de la peor crisis de dominacion levantando la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida con la RPDC.
					
					 La "reunificacion", que viene de cerca al decir de Lee, es precisamente la "mediante la absorcion y la fusion de regimenes".
					
					 Como ya conocen todos, desde el inicio de su mandato, el traidor Lee y su banda lanzaron una inaudita campana anti-RPDC en virtud de su anacronica politica conflictiva con ella, diciendo publicamente que la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" es su "sueno mas grande y meta mas importante". Ademas, ofendieron atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y no repararon ni en las acciones terroristas de gran envergadura. 
					
					 Si ellos no hubieran tomado el poder, se habria completado cuanto antes el proceso de reconciliacion, cooperacion y reunificacion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					 La reunificacion de la nacion coreana esta demorando no por la falta del dinero sino por culpa de los traidores opositores a la reunificacion como Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Ahora, Lee es arrinconado por el pueblo surcoreano y por los propios compinches como "Partido Saenuri" debido a los escandalos de corrupcion de sus familiares, parientes y colaboradores cercanos. 
					
					 La realidad demuestra que lo que se acerca en realidad es el arruinamiento de la banda del traidor Lee.
